long_description: With 60 TPI casing and Kevlar(R) 3D Compound, the Rubino III road tire is a durable option that offers a comfortable ride. This value-priced performance tire incorporates 60 TPI nylon casing cord, offering a good mix of durability, performance and affordability. The addition of Kevlar improves wear, enhances grip and reduces rolling resistance. PBR(R) puncture protection is placed directly under the tread for maximum puncture protection while maintaining low rolling resistance. Updated tread pattern increases the contact surface area and preserves low rolling resistance. 4-wire rigid bead provides an easy fit to wheel.
short_description: With 60 TPI casing and Kevlar(R) 3D Compound, the Rubino III road tire is a durable option that offers a comfortable ride.
